member.name: T:FiguresBox.FigureBox
member.summary: Represents a box with figures

member.summary: Creates an instance of the FiguresBox class

member.summary: Box size

member.summary: Figures list

member.name: M:FiguresBox.FigureBox.AddFigure(Figures.Figure)
member.summary: Add a figure to the list of figures
member.returns: True if the operation was completed successfully; otherwise, false

member.name: M:FiguresBox.FigureBox.ShowByNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows a figure by number

member.name: M:FiguresBox.FigureBox.ExtractByNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts a figure from figures list by number

member.summary: Replaces a figure by the specified number
member.returns: True if the operation was completed successfully; otherwise, false

member.summary: Searches for the figure equivalent

member.summary: Searches for all circles in the figures list

member.summary: Searches for all film figures in the figures list

member.name: M:FiguresBox.FigureBox.GetNeverPaintedPlasticFigures
member.summary: Searches for all never painted plastic figures in the figures list

member.summary: Shows quantity of figures

member.summary: Shows the sum of the areas of the figures

member.summary: Shows the sum of the perimeters of the figures

member.summary: Saves figures using StreamWtirer
